filters.name: UI Foundation Active Initiatives
filters.jql: project = PI AND assignee in (chris.cantu@procore.com, alvaro.soto@procore.com) AND status not in (Done, Closed, Completed, Canceled) ORDER BY priority DESC, updated ASC
filters.description: All active UI Foundation initiatives from PI project

filters.name: UI Foundation At Risk
filters.jql: project = PI AND assignee in (chris.cantu@procore.com, alvaro.soto@procore.com) AND (status = "At Risk" OR (priority = Critical AND updated < -7d)) ORDER BY updated ASC

filters.name: UI Foundation Stale Initiatives
filters.jql: project = PI AND assignee in (chris.cantu@procore.com, alvaro.soto@procore.com) AND status in (New, Committed) AND updated < -14d ORDER BY updated ASC

filters.name: UI Foundation Migration Focus
filters.jql: project = PI AND assignee in (chris.cantu@procore.com, alvaro.soto@procore.com) AND summary ~ "Migration OR \"New Relic\"" AND status not in (Done, Closed, Completed)

automation_rules.name: Auto-flag stale Critical initiatives
actions: Add comment: 'Initiative auto-flagged as at-risk due to 7+ days without updates on Critical priority item'

automation_rules.name: At Risk Initiative Notifications
actions: Create calendar reminder for daily check-in

automation_rules.name: Initiative Progress Updates
conditions: status changed from 'At Risk' to 'In Progress'
actions: Add comment: 'Initiative back on track - risk status cleared'
